# analysisChanges

**Instance Property**

A stream your app uses to receive video-stream analysis results.

## Declaration

```swift
var analysisChanges: some AsyncSequence<SCSensitivityAnalysis, any Error> { get }
```

## Analyzing a video stream

- **analyze(_:)**: Analyzes individual video-stream frames for sensitive content.
- **beginAnalysis(of:)**: Analyzes video frames for the given capture device input.
- **beginAnalysis(of:)**: Analyzes video frames for the given decompression session.
- **endAnalysis()**: Stops stream analysis.
